View Javadoc
1   package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.eclipse.xml;
2   
3   import org.apache.commons.digester3.Digester;
4   import org.apache.commons.digester3.RuleSetBase;
5   
6   /**
7    * An Apache Commons Digester RuleSet for configuring a digester to parse the
8    * Eclipse formatter config XML into objects.
9    *
10   * @author jecki
11   * @author Matt Blanchette
12   */
13  class RuleSet extends RuleSetBase {
14  	/**
15  	 * @see
16  	 *      org.apache.commons.digester.RuleSetBase#addRuleInstances(org.apache.commons.digester.Digester)
17  	 */
18  	@Override
19  	public void addRuleInstances(Digester digester) {
20  		digester.addObjectCreate("profiles", Profiles.class);
21  		digester.addObjectCreate("profiles/profile", Profile.class);
22  		digester.addObjectCreate("profiles/profile/setting", Setting.class);
23  
24  		digester.addSetNext("profiles/profile", "addProfile");
25  		digester.addSetNext("profiles/profile/setting", "addSetting");
26  
27  		digester.addSetProperties("profiles/profile", "kind", "kind");
28  		digester.addSetProperties("profiles/profile", "name", "name");
29  		digester.addSetProperties("profiles/profile", "version", "version");
30  		digester.addSetProperties("profiles/profile/setting", "id", "id");
31  		digester.addSetProperties("profiles/profile/setting", "value", "value");
32  	}
33  }
